title: Easy bangers and mash with red wine and onion gravy
ingredients: ['4 sausages, of your choice', '1 to 2 teaspoons oil', '1 garlic clove', '1/2 onion, diced finely', '1 glass red wine', '500mg beef stock (made from 1 1/2 beef stock cubes)', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon onion gravy granules', '250 to 300g shop bought prepared mashed potato']
